title: Crypto Crime Down 29% in 2023: Chainalysis Report

title: Crypto market today – Bitcoin sinks below $42K
description: Today’s crypto headlines are dominated by a notable event as Bitcoin, the pioneer and bellwether of the crypto world, has experienced a significant downturn, sinking below the $42,000 mark. title: Trader Michaël van de Poppe Predicts 2x Surge for Top Altcoin, Says Ethereum Likely To Rally Against Bitcoin
description:
Cryptocurrency analyst and trader Michaël van de Poppe is turning bullish on decentralized oracle provider Chainlink (LINK). Van de Poppe tells his 685,200 followers on the X social media platform that LINK could soar by more than 90% from its current value. “LINK seems ready for continuation after sweeping the lows.
